decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is ramping up mana quickly to play powerful creatures and spells, while also disrupting the opponent's plan with removal spells and disruptive creatures. This deck aims to control the board and overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and card advantage. It utilizes mana dorks, ramp spells, and powerful green creatures to accelerate its game plan, while also having access to red removal spells and artifacts to deal with threats. The commander, Roxanne, Starfall Savant, synergizes well with the deck's strategy by providing card advantage and additional mana acceleration. Overall, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on and keep the pressure on the opponent throughout the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing various creatures and artifacts to continuously recur cards from the graveyard and ramp up mana production. It contains a mix of mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Fyndhorn Elves, as well as powerful creatures like Vengevine and Colossal Rattlewurm. The deck also includes key cards like Survival of the Fittest and Life from the Loam to enable graveyard manipulation and card advantage. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and the ability to consistently bring back key threats from the graveyard. Additionally, cards like Rogue's Passage and Balustrade Wurm provide ways to bypass blockers and close out the game quickly.

This deck focuses on a Golgari midrange strategy, utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Garruk and Nissa alongside efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay. The deck aims to control the board with disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, while generating card advantage with cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Liliana of the Veil. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements, with fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent access to both green and black mana. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building resources and overwhelming them with powerful threats.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of aggressive creatures, disruption spells, and recursion effects to control the board and chip away at the opponent's life total. The deck focuses on playing efficient black creatures like Gravecrawler, Bloodghast, and Lord Skitter to constantly pressure the opponent while using cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Hymn to Tourach to disrupt their game plan. The deck also utilizes cards like Animate Dead and Unearth to bring back key creatures from the graveyard for additional value. With a mix of early aggression and disruptive elements, this deck aims to outvalue and outpace the opponent in a one-on-one Duel Commander match.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of aggressive creatures, efficient removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. With a mix of burn spells, creatures with haste, and disruptive cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily reducing their life total. The inclusion of powerful creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Squee, Dubious Monarch provide additional threats that can quickly close out the game. Additionally, the deck has access to strong card advantage engines like Phoenix Chick and Malcolm, the Eyes to ensure that it does not run out of resources in a longer game.

This deck focuses on an Elf tribal strategy, utilizing a combination of ramp, card advantage, and powerful Elf synergies to overwhelm opponents. The key strategy revolves around quickly ramping into powerful Elf creatures like Elvish Archdruid and Ezuri, Renegade Leader, while also utilizing cards like Glimpse of Nature and Heritage Druid to generate massive amounts of mana and card advantage. The deck can quickly go wide with tokens and pump its creatures with cards like Craterhoof Behemoth for a game-ending alpha strike. Additionally, the deck includes various utility cards like Demonic Tutor and Assassin's Trophy for additional flexibility and removal options.

The deck focuses on a combination of fast, aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and put pressure on the opponent. With a mix of efficient removal like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt, along with powerful threats like Tarmogoyf and Questing Beast, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly closing out the game. The inclusion of cards like Demonic Tutor and Worldly Tutor allows for additional consistency and flexibility in finding key cards. The deck also features a strong mana base with a mix of dual lands and fetch lands to ensure it can consistently cast its spells on curve.
